file_content.text: Thanks again, on behalf of the whole outpost.
Fine work out there, soldier. I hear those Imperials got a taste of what Special Forces is all about.
On behalf of the Republic military, thank you for your assistance. And for pulling my men's boots out of the fire.
The Empire's on the run, and we're about to make our final push into the Balmorran Arms Factory. Balmorra's freedom is assured. I'm prepared to call that a victory.
If the Jedi can be of any further assistance, Colonel, you only need to ask.
I was glad to help.
I'll be sure to note your order's assistance in my report, Master Jedi.
Claiming victory too soon can be fatal. You still have Imperial prisoners to handle.
You're wise to be cautious.
Might be a few Imperial holdouts, too. We'll find them all, Master Jedi.
I'm proud to have been part of this, Colonel.
Good to hear it, sir.
Seeing Havoc Squad in action was a pleasure.
We're kicking the Imperials off Balmorra, Colonel. At least crack a smile.
Oh come on, be excited.
I'll take it under advisement, Captain. There's still work to do.
The Balmorran resistance took heavy losses over in Moraine Territory. If you could spare anyone to help them out....
The resistance needs help.
The Empire hit civilians, eh? I'll see who I can send.
As long as it's over.
Commander Madine sends his compliments on helping ensure the planet's security and the safety of the Balmorran people. I second that.
I've got to get back to chasing Imperial scum. Oh, and a Gabe Dovaro from the resistance wants to speak with you in Bugtown.
Then that's where I'm headed.
Then that's where I'm headed.
Do you need help chasing those last Imperials, Colonel?
I could still help here.
Good grief, saving an entire planet's not enough for you? No, we'll manage. And I'm sure you have other business.
I'm leaving.
I want some danger pay, first.
That gear doesn't come cheap, hmm? If it keeps you shooting Imperials, I won't say "no."
Good hunting.
You should be talking to Sergeant Jojames and Major Garik if we're ever going to hold that factory.
I told the guardsman, no unauthorized personnel wandering in--hmph.
You must be Commander Madine's reinforcements. Looks like he meant it.
My intelligence reports say you do impressive work. Frankly, I don't need heroes right now. To retake the Balmorran Arms Factory, we need a blasted miracle.
We have some probe droid data.
We're your miracle, Colonel.
I take it you're Commander Madine's reinforcements. Guess he thought Havoc Squad would be enough.
So you're Commander Madine's reinforcements? Got to say, I was hoping for more people.
I have some data for you.
I've heard your name in briefings. Frankly, I don't need a hero right now. To retake the Balmorran Arms Factory, we need a blasted miracle.
The Balmorran resistance sabotaged several Imperial probe droids to spy for them. They said you might find their data useful.
I have some probe droid data.
Hmph. Interesting. This could help us keep a lid on the Empire's activities.
Are things really so bad?
I'm your miracle, Colonel.
The Imperials have consolidated their remaining forces in a last stand. They're throwing everything they have at Balmorran Arms.
We're looking at veteran soldiers, droids and Imperial tech we've never seen before. Sound like something you could handle?
You have my lightsaber, Colonel. The Balmorran Arms Factory will soon be secure.
Leave this to me.
Success is never certain, Colonel, but I'll do whatever I can.
I believe so.
Just let me at them, sir.
Absolutely, Colonel.
Sit tight, boss. Those Imperials will be running scared.
I'm on it.
Has the Empire brought in some sort of new weapon?
What's the new Imperial tech?
Not exactly. Major Garik can give you the details.
If it means killing Imperials.
I've got two men handling the factory defense. Sergeant Jojames is trying to cut off the Imperials' approach; he could use some assistance.
And Major Garik reported heavy losses after his squad ran into some Imperial.... device. Whatever it is, I need it gone.
The Empire's got nowhere to go. We're finishing what we started--freeing Balmorra. Get to it, soldier.
The Empire's got nowhere to go. This time, Balmorra will be free. Show me what you can do.
No unauthorized personnel allowed here.
